reviewText: I love love British  cinema enjoyed every movie on this tape
8 old movies no one would want to watch and I love old b/w movies. maybe one out of the group was ok
Item as described.  Love the British movies!  The collections are quite a good deal.
This product was just fine. It played great and had a good quality video.
IT is very good, but it does not have closed captions , or at least I could not turn them on
Liked these productions except the Dr. Jekyll one.  Both the Hyde character & the little boy's  make-up were ridiculous.  All other productions were first rate.
Four of the movies were a waste of time
BRITISH ARE GREAT STORY TELLERS -- ALWAYS WITH AUTHENTICITY, CLASSIC VENUES, CUSTUMING, & RICH ---FREQUENTYLY TRUE STORYLINES

Love it for the sake of the Dicken's stories Thie others are a bit odd and unless you are looking for ridiculous sex and violence I can't recommend "Love and Rage" at all. First, that it was a stupid story line, Then, just seemed to be all about fear and predatory relationship.
Meh. I love old movies but these are definitely B movies. The only thing they are good for is MST3K.
Some oldies, some moldies, a few goodies.
